project_abstract.cdata: The basic objectives of the State Farms Commercialization Project are 1) to support, accelerate, and catalyze enterprise reform within the state farm system with a line of credit to be extended through an independent project financial intermediary (PFI) to state farms and enterprises for technological modernization of existing production facilities or establishment of new commercial ventures and 2) to increase the capacity of the China Trust and Investment Corporation for Economic Development (CTICED), the PFI, to conduct long-term lending activities. Financing will be predominantly used by small and medium scale light industries, of a scale sufficient to support environmental pollution control technology, and linked to defined steps in enterprise reform in China--enterprise autonomy; ownership diversification, with participation of collectives and private and foreign-funded enterprises; introduction of the shareholding system; improvement of selected industries with advanced and new technology; development if marketing and distribution systems; and removal of social services from enterprises. The loan is expected to be disbursed over a five-year period. The complete portfolio will consist of about 50 subprojects with average subloans of $4.0 million.

P003591.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>国营农场项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的基本目标是：（1）通过独立项目金融中介机构向国营农场和企业提供信贷，用于实现现有生产设施技术现代化或建立新型商业企业，从而支持、促进和催化国营农场系统内部企业改革；（2）提升项目金融中介机构——中国经济开发信托投资公司开展长期贷款活动的能力。资金将由具备足够规模的中小轻工企业主要用于支持采用环境污染控制技术，并将与中国企业改革既定步骤（如实现企业自治等）挂钩，同时支持吸引集体及民营和外资企业参与实现所有权多样化，引入股份制，采用先进新技术对选定企业进行改造，建立并完善营销和销售体系，将社会服务功能从企业剥离。预计项目贷款支付期将为五年。项目将包括约50个子项目，子贷款平均规模为400万美元。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
